text: Andreas Asimakopoulos (born 14 January 1889, date of death unknown) was a Greek swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre freestyle event at the 1912 Summer Olympics and the water polo tournaments at the 1920 Summer Olympics and the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Greek male swimmers Category:Greek male water polo players Category:Olympic swimmers of Greece Category:Olympic water polo players of Greece Category:Swimmers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Alexandria Category:Greek male freestyle swimmers
title: Andreas Asimakopoulos
